commit.message:
MSVC bringup and other improvements:

* Simplify the build workflows.
* Introduce ASM support and leverage CPU optimized ASM source files.
* Remove git submodules and integrate the related libraries into the build process.
* Default to Release builds to improve the users experience.
* Introduce a flag that controls compiling tests.
* Make use of the official bls-signatures repo.
* Default to not compiling tests and benchmarks for bls-signatures.
* Don't set ENV{RELIC_MAIN}.
* Don't require libsodium as we take care of that through bls-signatures.
* We no longer need custom CMake modules to compile the plotter.
* Sanitize global include directories and favor target specific ones.
* Improve target link libraries setups.
* Make libbech32 tests compile with MSVC.
* Fix libbech32 PIE handling.
* Introduce a flag to control building libbech32 tests and examples.
* Introduce support for the ninja generator/build.

MSVC bringup and other improvements:

* Simplify the build workflows.
* Introduce ASM support and leverage CPU optimized ASM source files.
* Remove git submodules and integrate the related libraries into the build process.
* Default to Release builds to improve the users experience.
* Introduce a flag that controls compiling tests.
* Make use of the official bls-signatures repo.
* Default to not compiling tests and benchmarks for bls-signatures.
* Don't set ENV{RELIC_MAIN}.
* Don't require libsodium as we take care of that through bls-signatures.
* We no longer need custom CMake modules to compile the plotter.
* Sanitize global include directories and favor target specific ones.
* Improve target link libraries setups.
* Make libbech32 tests compile with MSVC.
* Fix libbech32 PIE handling.
* Introduce a flag to control building libbech32 tests and examples.
* Introduce support for the ninja generator/build.
